page.title: 11GAMES CHILDREN PLAY
page.content:
My favourite game is "colour bulldog", one person is chosen to be on and he/she thinks of a colour. If you are wearing that colour then you are allowed to run across without getting caught.If you are not wearing that particular colour then you have to run across trying not to get caught. If you caught you are on with the other person.The game continues until everyonehas been caught.- Rachel Ryan.
My favourite game is hopscotch. It is so easy to play . All you need is a stone and you need a court which is numbered from one to ten. You throw the stone and it will land on a number. Then you have to hop through the squares except for the one where your stone is. You hop over this one.
